message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split.
Bob, this is already costing us both. I'll meet you closer to the middle ground, but I still need a larger share to compensate for the inflation.
Inflation is hitting you harder, I'll give you a bit less, but still more than I think you'll get if we keep going.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a significant hit from inflation.  We need to close this deal now. Let's split the difference and end this.
I can afford to wait, inflation is crushing your share. I'll give you 40% this time, take it or leave it.
